title: Fabrication of a ZnFe2O4@Co/Ni-MOF nanocomposite and photocatalytic degradation study of azo dyes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30957-30970
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05283H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Khalid Javed, Naseem Abbas, Muhammad Bilal, Abdulaziz A. Alshihri, Hafiza Zahra Rab Nawaz, Mohamed Fawzy Ramadan, Syed Ali Raza Naqvi
This study addresses the critical issue of removing organic pollutants from water, focusing on the photocatalytic degradation of Congo red (CR) dye using a novel ZnFe2O4@Co–Ni metal–organic framework (MOF) nanocomposite (ZFCNM).
